bike.description: Fuji A2-SL custom-butted alloy w/ PowerCurve down tube, smooth welds, hydroformed top tube, tapered 1 1/8" - 1.5" head tube, BB91 bottom bracket. Rear triangle: Fuji A2-SL custom-butted alloy monostay w/ hydroformed chainstay, cold-forged dropout, post disc mount and replaceable hanger

components.description: Fox 32 FLOAT 29 Evolution CTD w/ remote lock out, 15mm thru axle, tapered alloy steerer, remote lockout, 100mm travel
Shimano Deore, M615 w/ integrated spindle, 38/24T
Shimano Deore XT, M786 SGS Shadow, 10-speed
Formula CL-81 front / Formula CL-36 rear, 32H disc hubs, Sun Inferno 25 rims
Schwable Nobby Nic, 29" x 2.25" folding, 67 tpi
Oval M250, alloy riser bar, 9° sweep, 31.8mm diameter, 710mm wide, +/- 5mm rise
Oval M313, 3D-forged alloy, 31.8mm clamp diameter, 6° rise
Oval M300, alloy double-bolt micro-adjust, 31.6mm x 350mm
